programme.title: Donal's Soul Food Shorts: Passover

programme.title: Ireland's Hidden Treasures
programme.desc: Delve into the secrets concealed within the National Museum and National Library of Ireland. Unearth the story of the Brasky Mass, a 4.5-billion-year-old meteorite. S1 Ep1

programme.title: Keys to My Life
programme.desc: Musician and actor Steve Wall embarks on a moving journey from his London childhood to his teenage days in The Claddagh, reflecting on the moments that shaped his career. S4 Ep5

programme.desc: Hayley surprises Emma with a tempting proposal. A fuming Babs is determined to discover why Kira won't work with Ruby. Liam is shocked to find Fergal living in near squalor. S24 Ep30

programme.title: The Full Irish Hidden Camera Show

programme.title: Life's A Breeze

programme.desc: Reflections on the political week and current affairs, combined with interviews and discussion from journalists, senators and TDs.

programme.desc: Léargas ar an tábhacht atá le CLG Bheirlín d'Éireannaigh óga sa nGearmáin. (A look at how Berlin GAA provides an important focal point for young Irish people based in Germany.)

programme.title: An Aimsir Láithreach
programme.desc: Aimsir réigiúnach agus náisiúnta. (National and regional weather.)

programme.title: Nuacht TG4
programme.desc: Mórimeachtaí an lae ó Aonad Nuachta TG4. (The day's main news stories from a regional, national and international perspective.)

programme.title: Ollchlár Ros na Rún
programme.desc: An bhfuil Laoise ag rith ar an tanaí? (The other woman: is Laoise skating on thin ice?)

programme.title: An Ríl Deal
programme.desc: Tá an babhta ceannais buailte linn agus tá sé in am ag na moltóirí seaimpín a roghnú. (It's the grand final and the judges will decide who will be crowned champion.)

programme.title: Slí na mBeaglaoich
programme.desc: Tá Breanndán agus Cormac Ó Beaglaoich ar bóthar arís, ar aistear ceoil i lár tíre. (Father and son once again take on an Irish musical journey together.)

programme.title: Transatlantic Sessions
programme.desc: An chuid is fearr de na Transatlantic Sessions le scór bliain. (Highlights from two decades of Transatlantic Sessions. Presented by Julie Fowlis & Muireann Nic Amhlaoibh.)

programme.title: Iniúchadh TG4
programme.desc: Fiosróidh Kevin Magee na fadhbanna atá sa tionscal iascaigh in Éirinn i ndiaidh an Bhreatimeachta. (Kevin Magee investigates Ireland's fishing industry post-Brexit.)

programme.title: Geantraí
programme.desc: An píobaire, Máire Ní Ghráda a chuirfidh an clár seo i láthair as Malachy¿s i gCuinche. (Piper Máire Ní Ghráda presents tonight's programme from Malachy's pub in Quin, Co. Clare.)
